admin.mod-database-use-internal-connection: Use the same connection as Glewlwyd server

admin.mod-ldap-object-class: Object class property for a new record
admin.mod-http-username-format-error: Format is optional and must contain {username}
admin.mod-http-default-scope-error: At least one default scope is required
admin.mod-glwd-scope-override-refresh-duration: Refresh token duration (seconds) - 0: Keep default value

admin.mod-glwd-additional-parameter-token-para: This token property value is forbidden
admin.mod-glwd-auth-type-code-revoke-replayed: Revoke all tokens if a client tries to replay a code

admin.mod-glwd-url-error: Prefix is required and must be unique
admin.mod-glwd-allow-non-oidc: Allow non OIDC but valid OAuth2 requests
admin.mod-glwd-claims: Additional claims in the ID Token or the /userinfo endpoint

admin.mod-glwd-claims-user-property: Corresponding property in the user profile
admin.mod-glwd-address-claim-message: You can specify if a claim address is available and what properties correspond to address fields
admin.mod-glwd-jwt-request-pubkey: JWT requests, public keys and JWKS
admin.mod-glwd-default-kid-error: Error, kid not found in the JWKS
admin.mod-glwd-jwt-request-maximum-exp: Maximum expiration time authorized for JWT requests
admin.mod-glwd-request-parameter-allow: Allow passing request parameter as JWT
admin.mod-glwd-request-parameter-ietf-strict: Strict compliance with IETF request parameter
admin.mod-glwd-request-parameter-allow-encrypt: Allow encrypted request parameter as JWT
admin.mod-glwd-request-uri-allow-https-non-sec: Allow request_uri and jwks_uri to a insecure https:// uri
admin.mod-glwd-url-auth: URL API Auth for this instance
admin.mod-glwd-url-token: URL API Token for this instance
admin.mod-glwd-url-profile: URL API Profile for this instance
admin.mod-glwd-introspection-revocation-scope-: Required scopes in the access token

admin.mod-glwd-register-client-token-one-use: Scope used for registration can be used once
admin.mod-glwd-register-client-management-allo: Allow clients to manage their registration
admin.mod-glwd-register-resource-specify-allow: Allow client to specify resource indicators
admin.mod-glwd-session-cookie-name-error: OIDC session cookie name is mandatory
admin.mod-glwd-session-cookie-expiration-error: OIDC session cookie expiration is mandatory
admin.mod-glwd-oauth-ciba-allow-https-non-secu: Allow out requests ping and push to a insecure https://
admin.mod-glwd-oauth-ciba-mode-error: You must allow at least one mode
admin.mod-glwd-oauth-ciba-email-allowed: Send an e-mail to the targeted user
admin.mod-glwd-oauth-ciba-email-body-pattern-e: E-mail body is mandatory for language '{{lang}}' and must contain the pattern {CONNECT_URL}
admin.mod-glwd-oauth-fapi-allow-multiple-kid: Allow clients with multiple similar kid
admin.mod-glwd-oauth-fapi-ciba-confidential-cl: CIBA allowed clients must be confidential
admin.mod-email-body-pattern: E-mail body, the pattern {CODE} will be replaced by the code
admin.mod-email-body-pattern-token: E-mail body, the pattern {TOKEN} will be replaced by the token

admin.mod-webauthn-session-mandatory: User must have a valid session to connect
admin.mod-webauthn-force-fmt-none: Force attestations without validation certificate (much lesser safe)
admin.mod-webauthn-seed: Random seed used to mitigate intrusion
admin.mod-webauthn-credential-expiration: Maximum duration to register a component (seconds)

admin.mod-webauthn-credential-assertion: Maximum duration to complete an authentication (seconds)
admin.mod-webauthn-credential-assertion-error: Maximum duration to complete an authentication is mandatory
admin.mod-webauthn-fmt-error: You must select at least one format
admin.mod-webauthn-pubKey-cred-params-error: You must select at least one signature type

admin.mod-webauthn-root-ca-path: Certificates file path on the server
admin.mod-webauthn-safetynet-integrity-params: Potential integrity verdict for Android SafetyNet devices

admin.mod-webauthn-google-root-ca-r2-ph: Leave empty if no chain validation is required
admin.mod-webauthn-google-root-ca-r2-download-: Download “GlobalSign Root CA- R2” (DER Format) from Google PKI

admin.mod-webauthn-apple-root-ca-ph: Leave empty if no chain validation is required
admin.mod-webauthn-apple-root-ca-download-link: Download “Apple WebAuthn Root CA” (PEM Format) from Apple Private PKI
admin.mod-certificate-user-property-error: At least one of these fields is mandatory
admin.mod-certificate-user-certificate-ca-chai: Select all the certificates of the CA chains you want to use for validation
admin.mod-register-session-duration-error: Session duration is mandatory and must be positive
admin.mod-register-scope-error: You must select at least one scope
admin.mod-register-has-mandatory-error: You must have at least one mandatory authentication method
admin.mod-register-body-pattern-doc: The patterns {CODE} and {TOKEN} will be replaced by the code and the token
admin.mod-register-verification-code-length-er: Verification code length is mandatory and must be above 0
admin.mod-register-verification-code-duration-: Verification code duration is mandatory and must be above 0
admin.mod-register-reset-credentials-session-d: Session duration is mandatory and must be positive

admin.mod-reset-credentials-code-list-size-err: Number of recovery codes available is mandatory and must be a non null positive integer
admin.mod-oauth2-help_url: Online help to configure the provider settings

admin.confirm-delete-api-key: Are you sure you want to disable this API key?

admin.mod-glwd-resource-scope-empty-error: Resource url list must not be empty
admin.mod-glwd-resource-scope-url-error: A resource url must be a 'https://' or 'http://localhost' and can't include a fragment

admin.mod-glwd-resource-scope-and-client-error: You must set a resource scope list and set a client resource property

profile.reset-credentials-code-reset-label: A recovery code allows to change your password or reconfigure your authentication schemes if you have lost or forgot your credentials. A recovery code is good for only one use. Please save your recovery codes in a safe place. You can reset your recovery codes at any time on your profile page, although old codes that are still active will be disabled after a recovery code reset.
profile.reset-credentials-code-reset-label-modal: Please save the following new recovery codes
profile.reset-credentials-complete-message: After changing your password and/or restoring your credentials, you can reconnect to the application using the following link

profile.scheme-register-forbidden: The administrator forbids to register or get the registration of this scheme
